thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Greg Sutton

author: Greg Sutton
title: Greg Sutton
text: When purchasing ticket, your price was quite competitive, so I proceeded with the booking, however, I really didn't want insurance cover as I already have insurance for my whole vacation. I could not seem to proceed with the booking until I clicked on the insurance dialog box! So I accepted insurance which Quote: d PHP 650 or there abouts! However, the final amount charged for insurance was in excess of PHP3000! I found found this part of the booking confirmation process misleading and I was a bit disappointed! Greg Sutton
